content: I'm dmg and we're gonna be talking about undercoating dungeon terrain
all right so you're going to want to go outside for this it was a windy day when
I performed this task and that's why things are looking a little bit unruly
so you want to use a I you reuse cardboard all the time as a backing so
that you don't spray anything important and it's important to shake the spray
paint project so that the paint is not terribly thick or sludgy when it comes
out of the can and you want to get quite an even coat in the beginning so you
know I tend to be a little bit close with with the can but that I I feel a
little bit more control over that and when I'm doing it you don't want to hit
anything else while you're spraying this cat used to be white so you want to make
sure that the black is flat and you're not able to see any of the cardboard
through it and you really want to hit those walls not only on the top but down
on the sides because that's really going to when we paint it it's going to create
the shadow the sort of shadow effect without having to repaint a shadow I
also feel that you need to spray inside the edges as well so that when it's
viewed from the side you don't see anything any of the cardboard helps to
to sell the piece a little bit better so that's why you see me going over it a
couple of times and especially spraying into the grooves so as you're going to
see here when I turn it around so obviously the the sides on the bottom
won't actually hit so we turn them around and we'll hit those sides as well
now the reason you do this outside is because you want a bit of ventilation
and things get a little bit messy as you can see so if you want you can actually
use gloves but I'm ok with miss so really get into the grooves and then
pretty much you're going to just leave it to dry for all about 15 20 minutes it
would be ready but you could leave it longer than that but generally I leave
it for 15-20 minutes that's may need to get the smell out so I'll leave them
outside if it's raining you probably want to keep them under cover so I want
to hear everything you have to say so write it in the comment section alone
I'll get back to you you can like the video subscribe to the channel and visit
us on the dmg info see ya you
